column5: Well then... As I ***WILL be in Bagotville QC this summer I might as well ask... Is there anywhere nearby (particularily BFC/CFB Bagotville) to fish for... Well... Fish  I was wondering what is in the area and some tactics. I will be there for approx 7 weeks if i go and will have limited available transportation but was wondering where if anywhere there is any half decent fishing. Thanks for any replies or PM's...  Bill
I know that the shipsaw river has huge pike in it,  As well as Bass. I used to fish there when I lived in Quebec. I'll look up the area and get back to you with more info.
Bill here is a website with info on Quebec outfitters.  http://www.fpq.com/en/  MTP

Shipshaw (les Barrages a Arvida) does have some nice fish, everything from perch on up, but do check on the specific requirements for each specie of fish, some you need a daily tag etc, some areas you may need a guide cause you'll be considered a non resident( best I can remember).  See if you can get hold of "dabluz" local member from there.  They may still have the two ponds open on the Base( Parc Lambert) Lambert Park for the blokes or tetes carres(flash cube)
Thanks for the responces... Keep em coming... I can use all the help I can get
Ohh and By the way I will be very close to " La Baie" if anyone can help there...
hey bill parker  get a hold of dabluz. theres alot of oppurtunitys for fishing.  do you speak any french?

Je Ne parle pas bon Francais... but I do know a couple of bilingual guys who could act as translators... Oh and as well... I also was wondering how the licencing works... I am an Ontario Resident and a Minor so do I still need a non-res licence and do I need one for particular species? as well I looked at their maps and boy are they confusing... Any more help is Greatly appreciated

Bill don't worry about the french I know people who have lived here all there life and do not speak french.They get by.It would be cheaper to buy a license for the year Bill.Don't worry there is good fishing.I just don't know this area.I will talk to some people from the region.Let me get back to you.I don't know if a minor needs a licence.MTP
Thanks loads MTP... I am in no rush as it will be july/august when I go...
hey bill if you speak good enough french il pm ya with a french fishing website in quebec and there are loads of members in the saguenay lac st jean area. you might get into some sea run specks

Hey guys... I hate to bring up old posts but didn't really want to make a new one... I ended up getting the job in bagotville so I was wondering if anyone had any new news about fishing in the area... preferably close to the sir base or Chicouimi... Thanks in advance  Bill
bill contact fern of this board he is local to chicoutimi and ccould give you some real good advice and maybe show you a spot or 2  good luck and let us know how it works out
Hmmm... I just did a member search for him... is that his screen name?
Not a problem... he must not be active then cause I couldn't find him... but thanks for trying to help
hmm hes always here pm roy and ask him, he should know...weird if i have to il go on the french fishing board i frequent and get his email take care
